name: RUST (itch) (L4J0)
description:
FUTURE
Long ago humanity extinguished. A chain reaction caused the sea level to rise faster than expected and to engulf almost the entire globe within 20 years. With the last desperation, they created a project to build giant robots to save those who remained and keep them above the ever-rising sea level. But it was too late. 

In this dystopian world we control a small robot. But something about him is special. He has feelings like a human being. Which makes him feel very lonely. 

This leads to his journey to create himself a friend so that he doesnt feel lonely no more.

Controls

Keyboard:

Move with WASD, Jump with Spacebar, Interact with E Key, Pause Game with Esc or P Key, Navigate in Menu with LMB and Backspace.

Gamepad:

Move with Left Thumb Stick, Jump with Face Button South, Interact with Face Button West, Pause Game with Control Button, Navigate in Menu with Face Button South and East.

Credits

The lecturers from htk hamburg and papermoon.

Made with Unreal Engine 5

Assets are all created in blender

Most Soundfiles are owned by WeLoveIndies

redesigned with Reaper and added and optimized with FMOD

Some assets are inspired by references from sketchfab

The walkthrough might appear harder than it actually is. I lack skills on mouse and keyboard. :)
